title: Not optimum mode -Recommended 1680x1050 60hZ
body:
Yesterday ..I decided to play normal game just to try new graphics (e.g 1600x800 etc etc) ..Then I pressed "Restore Defaults"...While I was waiting graphics to change ..suddenly my screen turned black and appeared this message : Not optimum mode -Recommended 1680x1050 60hZ

Your ideas are all valuable 

-Thanks

replies.body: If you have a black screen but are still able to hear game sounds, then you might be having an issue where your hardware or game files are failing to render properly.  Go over our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help get this fixed up, starting with updating your drivers.  Let me know if you still have any issues afterwards!
Nothing is working for me can you please help me

Hey, no worries we can take a closer look!  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to collect some logs and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  With some more context our tech team should be able to offer some more options for you.  See you there!
